pkgmetadata.longdescription: robotpy-wpimath===============Python wrappers for WPILib's wpimath library.* Installation instructions can be found in the [RobotPy documentation](https://robotpy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting_started.html)* Documentation can be found at [readthedocs](https://robotpy.readthedocs.io/projects/wpimath/en/stable/api.html)
